body_html: Thanks @Lancerchiang that makes sense. I don't actually know if we'll ever have this use case in practice, it only came up because our test suite was failing when certain tests were run in different orders. Then we fell down a rabbit hole isolating this :). In the end we just had the workaround where we specifically arranged our suite to run the tests in the child processes first, and then the tests in the parent processes after. Not ideal but good enough for now. What I would like to do is add a line or two to check if this hang might hit and then Throw/Alert the user, so no one is left hanging.
